com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl

Interface ISmartCardReader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ISmartCardReader.Default, ISmartCardReader.Stub

    public interface ISmartCardReader
    the object of smart card (contact card, or IC card)

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description

      Local-side IPC implementation stub class.

      • checkCardStatus

        byte checkCardStatus()
              throws android.os.RemoteException
        check card status
        Returns:
        0x00-card not exist, 0x01-card exist, 0x02-card power on
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException
